  # cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Enable roundtrip feature (beta!): If you enable roundtrip, you can modify the autogenerated classes and your changes will be kept, even if you modify or rename the model in the kickstarter.
enableRoundtrip = 
  # cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Make a backup on each save: Should the kickstarter make a complete backup of the extension, each time you save it in the kickstarter? Only applies if roundtrip is enabled! It is recommended to enable backups if you don't use a versioning system!
backupExtension = 1
  # cat=basic; type=string; label=Backup dir: Name of the backup dir (as subdir of path_SITE or as absolute path)
backupDir = uploads/tx_extbasekickstarter/backups
